body.name: Steve Madden Women's Winter Coat - Long Length Quilted Puffer Parka Coat - Faux Fur Lined Plus Sized Jacket for Women (S-3X)
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED STEVE MADDEN: Women's Long Length Quilted Puffer Parka Coat with Faux Fur Lining and Hood Trim: Inspired by rock and roll and their New York roots, Steve Madden provides on-trend women and men an outlet to express their individuality with apparel that is innovative, daring, and inspiring

WOMEN'S WINTER COAT: This multipurpose and versatile faux fur-lined long-length winter coat for women is a must-have in your outerwear collection that will help you stay safe from the elements when the weather changes; This extra warm and comfy women's winter coat comes in a variety of fashionable colors to match your unique style

FUNCTIONAL WINTER JACKET: Deep side pockets cover chilly hands and keep valuables safe; With this fashionable winter coat for women, you will enjoy warm insulation against the elements; Wide faux-fur trimmed hood, comfy faux-fur inner lining, and large collar guarantee extra warmth and grant an additional level of protection against unfavorable weather conditions

DURABLE FABRIC: We fashioned this quilted long coat from wind and water resistant fabric that will ensure you stay comfortable when the rain or snow comes down; Great women's winter jacket for everyday wear and when hanging out with friends, running errands, or traveling; Our faux fur-lined coat for women combines modern fashion with outstanding functionality and convenience

COMFORT FIT: Comfortable and extra warm puffer parka for women comes in a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit; With several classic color options to choose from, this women's heavyweight winter long coat is a perfect gift idea for wives, girlfriends, daughters, sisters, nieces, granddaughters, cousins, and friends
body.description: Steve Madden Women's Winter Coat - Long Length Quilted Puffer Parka Coat - Faux Fur Lined Heavyweight Hooded Jacket is a great choice for every fashionable woman when the temperature drops. Stay comfortable on chilly days with an extra warm and stylish puffer parka coat, designed with fashion and comfort in mind. Featuring deep side pockets to protect your hands from the cold and extra warm faux-fur lining for maximum comfort, this stylish outerwear is perfect for work, campus, school, going to the mall, traveling, or having fun on the slope. GREAT INSULATION: You will stay on top of winter weather without being too bulky while the comfy wide hood and large collar will make your life so much easier during the unpredictable fall and winter seasons. SOFT AND COMFY: Go from chilly to comfy in seconds. This winter jacket is faux-fur lined and helps adapt perfectly to the weather outside and keeps you warm and stylish every day. DURABLE WOMEN'S JACKET: Whether hanging out on a cold day or having fun in the snow with family and friends, you won't have to worry about ripping and fading. The durable fabric will last through all your outdoor adventures and winter activities. WINTER LONG-LENGTH COAT: Our water and wind-resistant winter parka coat for women delivers proper protection against the elements, while the high-quality materials guarantee maximum warmth and comfort throughout the day. EASY TO CLEAN: Simply machine wash and tumble dry; Please Reference the Variations for All Available Sizes & Colors! Steve Madden Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we're confident you're going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will absolutely love and adore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits very well, soft and goes with anything
reviews.reviewText: very comfortable, nice an warm, very surprised its is this nice for under 100 bucks, absolutely would buy again!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm cuddly Coat
reviews.reviewText: I like Steve Madden cloth. This coat does not disappoint. Warm, well made. Love the titanium color, very different

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really loved how cozy this coat was with the puffer coat outside and the soft furry inside...the zipper was sturdy and easy to maneuver too!!!....my only problem was L was too small and 1X was too big...didn't seem to be an XL which might have been perfect🤔sadly it won't be going to Oslo with me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and very warm!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter who has Reynaud's and is cold all the time, she really loves this! She said it keeps her very warm outside in the freezing cold as the faux fur lining is toasty and warm without having to wear bulky layers underneath, plus she loves the titanium color since it looks different shades, depending on the light it could look silver or a dark shade of grey. Some people may not like the color changing effect but she does! I tried it on and it is a warm and cute coat, may get one for myself in a different color! Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and Warm
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5ft, 215lbs and I got a 1X. It fits well with room to spare. The inside fur like material is very soft and warm and trapps heat in very well and the material extends into the hood but not down the sleeves. It's perfect for temperature 40° and below. (Currently it's in the 20s and 30s and dipping into the teens here in nyc with snow) In my opinion, it traps heat so well that it might be too much for temperature in the 50s or above. I was Afraid it would be too light weight but it's a good amount of thickness while still keeping out the cold. It's comfortable where u don't feel stiff and can move arms just fine. I will definitely get on for my daughter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife was extremely pleased with her coat!!!
reviews.reviewText: My wife was very pleased with her new coat. It fit her perfectly and looks very good on her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Warm & cozy, but a few issues
reviews.reviewText: This is a great warm cozy coat. Fit is perfect. However, the faux fur lining is problematic. It sheds like crazy on your clothes, and acts almost like a velcro on your backside, making it creep up and hard to pull down to cover your bum! The hood is also massive, and turns in-side out on it's own. Will be returning. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm and stylish
